article: thailand 's new prime minister faces the difficult task of unifying a country torn apart by months of violent anti-government protests -- demonstrations that battered the key tourism industry just as the global economy was slipping into its worst crisis in decades .
abstract: new thai pm faces deep divisions poor economy
